revised_title: Douglas William Holder: A Pioneering Career in Aerodynamics and High-Speed Flows
tldr: This article is a biographical memoir of Douglas William Holder, a pioneering figure in the field of aerodynamics and high-speed flows. Holder made significant contributions to the understanding and expertise needed for flight from high subsonic speeds to the speeds of space vehicles. His work at the National Physical Laboratory (NPL) provided the essential foundation for aviation advancements in the UK, and his exceptional planning, speed, and innovative approach to his work made him a phenomenon in his field.
